text: Ali-Asghar Shahbazi (; November 1922 – 29 November 2020) was an Iranian actor. He was born in Tehran. He was known for his role as Nader's father in the 2011 drama A Separation. Shahbazi died on 29 November 2020 in Tehran from cardiopulmonary arrest at the age of 98.علی اصغر شهبازی در سکوت درگذشت ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiopulmonary arrest Category:Actors from Tehran
title: Ali-Asghar Shahbazi
